text: was the Imperial capital of Japan between 694 and 710. It was established by Empress Jitō in Yamato Province (present-day Kashihara in Nara Prefecture).Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2002). "Fujiwara-kyō" in Japan Encyclopedia, pp. 200-201. ==Related pages== * Capital of Japan * Heijō-kyō ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Former capitals of Japan
title: Fujiwara-kyō
